mapper.select: select movie_id as movieId, count(*) as time,name from (select * from schedule where start_time between #{date} and #{nextDate}) s, movie where s.movie_id = movie.id group by movieId

select movie.id as movieId, boxOffice,name from movie left join (select movie_id as movieId,sum(fare) as boxOffice from schedule right join (select schedule_id from ticket where state = 1) t on schedule.id = t.schedule_id group by movie_id) s on s.movieId = movie.id order by boxOffice desc

select user_id as userId, sum(fare) as totalPrice from schedule right join (select * from ticket where schedule_id in (select id from schedule where start_time between #{date} and #{nextDate}) and state = 1) t on schedule.id = schedule_id group by user_id

select movie.id as movieId, ifnull(boxOffice,0) as boxOffice, name from movie left join (select movie_id as movieId,sum(fare) as boxOffice from schedule right join (select schedule_id from ticket where state = 1) t on schedule.id = t.schedule_id and (start_time between #{startDate} and #{today}) group by movie_id) s on s.movieId = movie.id order by boxOffice desc limit #{num}
